name: Fixit Clinics
description: Free community repair workshops with volunteer coaches to help fix broken electronics, appliances, computers, toys, sewing machines, and textiles; tools and workspace provided
fullDescription: San Mateo County's Fixit Clinics are free community repair events where volunteer coaches help residents fix broken items, reducing waste and saving money on replacements.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free repair assistance
- Electronics repair help
- Appliance troubleshooting
- Computer and device fixes
- Toy and small item repair
- Sewing machine and textile mending
howToGetIt:
1. Check event schedule online
2. Find Fixit Clinic near you
3. Bring broken items to event
4. Work with volunteer coach
5. Learn repair skills
6. Take fixed items home
keywords: Fixit Clinic, repair, free, electronics, appliance, computer, sewing, toy repair, San Mateo County
